# cook your dish here

t = int(input())
while t:
 A = input()
 B = input()
 mp1 = 0
 p1 = 0
 mp0 = 0
 p0 = 0
 for i in range(len(B)):
  if A[i]==B[i] and B[i]=='1':
   p1 += 1
  elif A[i]==B[i] and B[i]=='0':
   p0 += 1
  elif A[i]!=B[i] and B[i]=='1':
   mp0 += 1
  else:
   mp1 += 1
 #if A==B:
  #   con = True
  #  op = 0
 if mp0+p0==len(A) or mp1+p1==len(A):
  con = False
 elif mp1+p0>=mp0+p0:
  con = True
  op = mp1-mp0
  mp1 -= op
  op += mp1
 else:
  con = True
  op = mp0-mp1
  mp0 -= op
  op += mp0
 if con:
  print('Lucky Chef')
  print(op)
 else:
  print('Unlucky Chef')
 t -= 1
